thread.title: Broforce leaves Early Access, now officially available to blow stuff up
thread.title_full: Broforce leaves Early Access, now officially available to blow stuff up

author: News Zombie
title: Broforce leaves Early Access, now officially available to blow stuff up
text:
Posted on October 15, 2015 in PC News 
Broforce has bro-ed through Early Access and is now available in its full bro-ness. The final version features dozens of bros, each with unique arsenals and special attacks, four-player co-op and versus modes, destructible terrain, time attack levels, and a level editor. Bros can get to blowing sh-stuff up for less during launch week, with a 30% discount knocking the price down to $9.99. 
Brofoce is available on PC through GOG and Steam. A PlayStation 4 version is slated to launch early next year.
